summary: 2006 CROSSROADS ZINGER TRAVEL TRAILER REFRIGERATOR STOPPED WORKING.  CONSUMER STATES THAT HER FAMILY BECAME SICK FROM THE FUMES COMING FROM THE REFRIGERATION SYSTEM.   *NJ    THE CONSUMER STATED HER HUSBAND SMELLED A STRONG ODOR OF AMMONIA. THE CONSUMER EVENTUALLY RECEIVED A RECALL NOTICE IN THE MAIL REGARDING A DEFECT WITH THE REFRIGERATOR. *JB
